meanings.definition: A type of bacteria that is rod-shaped and can cause infections in humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: Corynebacteria are tiny organisms that can make people and animals sick.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying corynebacteria to understand how they spread infections.
meanings.sent3: The corynebacteria decided to throw a party in the human body, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bacteria, corynebacteria are like sneaky spies, infiltrating our systems.
meanings.sent5: Imagine corynebacteria as tiny, harmful rods marching through the body, causing trouble.
